name: Muffin Madness
description:
Blubie and Chocolita are best friends. Except the two cannot agree on what flavor combination tastes the best. Chocolate chips vs blueberry! 

Grab a friend and go head to head pelting each other with blueberries and chocolate. May the best flavor win!

**********************************

Controls

Player 1

W - Up

D - Down

Space - Shoot

Player 2

Arrow Up - Up

Arrow Down - Down

Left Crtl - Shoot

*********************************

Dev Notes:

Thank you for taking the time to try Muffin Madness! This project is a practice Godot project based on Gun Fight. Any feedback is much appreciated! <3
